short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Word Game based on Wordle for Chrome. It's all about cooking and uses food words!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free Word Game is a chef-themed word game for Chrome that you can play unlimitedly. It's a Wordle-inspired puzzle game, but focused entirely on food. Guess food-related words in six tries - it's easy and fun for everyone.

Playing Free Word Game is simple and engaging. Here’s how you can dive into this food-filled word challenge:

► Begin by guessing a 5-letter word related to food. The game is all about culinary vocabulary, so think about dishes, ingredients, or anything edible!

► You have six tries to figure out the daily food word. Each guess brings you closer to the correct answer.

► Color hints help you guess: Right color (Correct letter, right place), Different color (Correct letter, wrong place) & Gray (Letter not in the word)!

► After successfully guessing the word, you can share your score with friends and compare how you fared.

Explore the world of food with Free Word Games - Arkadium Games! Solve daily food-themed word puzzles, learn fun facts, and discover surprise recipes each week. Whether the word is "Apple" or "Bread," every guess brings you closer to becoming a food expert.

Test your food knowledge, sharpen your culinary skills, and join a global community of food lovers. Add Free Word Games - Arkadium Games to Chrome and dive into the fun! Guess, learn, and share - where every guess is a win!

One cool thing is that this Arkadium Games Extension is free, and you don't need to log in or sign up to use the services. (Installing or uninstalling this extension may display promotional content.)
